title: Perform a Technical SEO Audit
description: An SEO specialist needs to run a technical audit on a client's website to find issues like broken links and slow page speed.

tasks.description: Run a website crawl using an SEO auditing tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tool crawls the entire website and gathers data.

tasks.description: Analyze the audit report to identify critical issues, such as 404 errors (broken links) and pages with slow load times.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a list of technical problems.

tasks.description: Create a prioritized list of fixes for the development team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces an actionable report for the developers, starting with the most critical issues.
